name: Dinner Tonight: Asian-Inspired Corn, Avocado and Sesame Salsa
description: I didn’t mean to shake things up; I was just being resourceful. Here I was with a perfectly ripe avocado and not a lime to be found. When I usually face such draughts of product, I make do. But messing...

recipeInstructions.text: Quickly cook the corn in a skillet with about a teaspoon of the sesame oil over medium heat. When it slightly blackens, pull it off the heat and let cool.
Gently toss the rest of the ingredients together, adding the corn once it is cool. Season to taste with salt and pepper
